description.value:
You arrange a spiky cage of bones, particularly tough vegetation, or other material to spring up when disturbed. The snare deals @Damage[10d8[piercing]] damage to the first creature to enter this square; that creature must attempt a @Check[reflex|showDC:all|dc:34] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is knocked aside by the snare's deployment, takes half damage, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] until the end of its next turn.

Failure The creature is captured by the cage, taking full damage and falling @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone]. It's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized] while it remains within the cage. It can get free by [[/act escape dc=34]]{Escaping} (DC 34) or by destroying the cage (AC 30, Fort +18, Ref +24, Hardness 5, HP 30, object immunities).

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature takes double damage.
